allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add SemiFlow Pipeline Simulator with synchronized station flow

Implement a 3-level hierarchical CMP wafer processing simulator:

- Level 1: Coordinator Scheduler - orchestrates wafer dispatch
- Level 2: Wafer Schedulers - manages individual wafer workflows  
- Level 3: Resource Schedulers - controls Robot, Platen1, Platen2

Key Features:
- Pipelined mode: Multiple wafers process concurrently (with buffers)
- Synchronized mode: One wafer at a time (station capacity: 1)
- Live dashboard with Spectre.Console visualization
- Wafer tracking with circled numbers (01), (02), (03)...
- Real-time pipeline status and resource utilization metrics

Station Capacity Constraints:
- Robot, Platen1, Platen2: max 1 wafer each
- Only FOUP and buffers can hold multiple wafers

Also includes:
- SemiFlow DSL v1.0 with JSON schema
- SemiFlow.Converter for XStateNet integration
- 75+ unit tests with full coverage
- VSCode extension for SemiFlow syntax highlighting

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
